DOC.brief_summary: To compare effectiveness cervical pessary ( Arabin ) vaginal progesterone preventing premature birth twin pregnancy IVF
DOC.brief_title: Cervical Pessary v . Vaginal Progesterone Preventing Premature Birth IVF Twin Pregnancies
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial . Women twin pregnancy IVF treatment , 16-22 week gestation , invite participate study . Subjects meet study criterion randomize two group : ( 1 ) treat cervical pessary ( Arabin ) ( 2 ) treat 400mg vaginal progesterone , daily 16-22 week 36 6/7 week . Sample size : 520 participant
DOC.criteria: To eligible enrolment trial , female subject must fulfil follow criterion start enrolment , unless specify otherwise : Twin ( mono dichorionic ) pregnancy . Cervical length ( measured 1622 week gestation ) < 38 mm . Willing participate study To eligible enrolment study subject must meet following criterion : Cervical cerclage place . Stillbirth major congenital abnormality baby Twintwin transfusion syndrome Praevia placenta Severe vaginal discharge , Premature rupture membrane Premature labor / Premature rupture membrane Participate another intervention trial
